thread.title: Watch Shahid Kapoor, Alia Bhatt perform Garba in Ahmedabad
thread.title_full: Watch Shahid Kapoor, Alia Bhatt perform Garba in Ahmedabad - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Watch Shahid Kapoor, Alia Bhatt perform Garba in Ahmedabad
text:
Ahmedabad : Actors Shahid Kapoor and Alia Bhatt gave a "Shaandaar" Garba performance in this city of Gujarat where Navratri festival is being celebrated with great fervour.
Watch Shahid and Alia perform Garba 
  A video posted by Alia (@aliaabhatt) onOct 19, 2015 at 12:39pm PDT
 
Alia took to Instagram on Tuesday to share a video of the duo doing the famous dance form.
In the video, Shahid and Alia can be seen performing Garba along with other dancers.
“aliaabhattGarba nights in Ahemdabad!!!! #Shaandaar #ShaandaarPromotions,” Alia captioned the video.
Before Ahmedabad, both Shahid and Alia were seen at various promotional events in Delhi and Bangalore.
Directed by Vikas Bahl, “Shaandaar” is slated to release on Friday.
